duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee daily valet operations for assigned dealership location(s), including working as valet, greeting customers, washing and parking vehicles, and running the daily operations of all assigned account(s).
Motivate and empower a team to provide world-class hospitality and effectively manage people, holding them accountable to expectations.
Create and manage the schedule, daily reports, and budget allocation, and be directly responsible for client satisfaction.
Responsible for the accountability of Account Managers, shift leads, team leads, and valet team members for all assigned location(s).

Maintain proper staffing levels and create weekly schedules for all location(s) within their portfolio. Administer and embody the company’s disciplinary action process and provide support to the Account Manager(s).
Identify and make changes for operations, safety, or procedural updates as needed. Assist in communicating these updates to corporate.
Directly responsible for building standard operating procedures and location pages for all current or new account(s) assigned, and ensure Account Managers are making the necessary edits.
Launching new locations within the assigned portfolio, administering local orientations and driving tests in coordination with Human Resources.
Create and implement site-specific training, identify and build additional training needs as needed at assigned location(s).
Responsible for account manager remaining compliant with budget allocation, attending to any escalated customer and client complaints, and handling incident claims and denial of claims.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree is preferred but not required
